content.rendered: The tear trough is the area between the cheek and the lower eyelid. As we age, our face loses volume and its natural concentration of hyaluronic acid. This can cause physical hollows beneath the eyes that create shadows on the face and along with the thinning of the under-eye skin , which makes the underlying blood vessels more evident, it contributes towards a tired- looking appearance, with dark circles and eye bags. Fortunately, with this treatment, small volumes of softer HA injectable fillers in the under eye area will leave your eyes looking fresher, rejuvenated, with almost no downtime.
